design_philosophy.vibe: Academic Rigor meets Digital Fluidity. A fusion of Swiss International Style (clarity, grids) and Organic Modernism (warmth, growth).
principles: Fusion over Imitation: Mix academic tradition (serifs, deep greens) with SaaS precision (mono fonts, grids).
Content is King: Data is the hero. Dashboards must be dense but breathable.
Negative Space: Use 'Stone' backgrounds to reduce eye strain compared to pure white.
Contrast: High contrast for data legibility (WCAG AA+).

typography.installation: Import Manrope and JetBrains Mono via Google Fonts in index.css

usage_rules: Never use gradients for backgrounds. Use solid 'Warm Stone' or 'Deep Teal'.
Use 'Electric Lime' ONLY for primary CTAs or critical alerts.
Dashboards should use 'Warm Stone' as the app background and White for cards.

spacing.base: Use 2x standard spacing. If you think p-4 is enough, use p-8.

grids.dashboard: Bento Grid Mode B: High Density. grid-cols-1 md:grid-cols-3 lg:grid-cols-4. Gap-4.
grids.landing: Tetris Grid Mode A: Asymmetry. grid-cols-1 md:grid-cols-12. Gap-8.

shadcn_overrides.card: rounded-none border-border/60 shadow-sm hover:shadow-md transition-all duration-300
shadcn_overrides.button: rounded-full font-medium tracking-wide. Primary: bg-[#0f393b] hover:bg-[#0f393b]/90. Secondary: bg-white border border-input hover:bg-accent hover:text-accent-foreground
shadcn_overrides.input: rounded-md border-input bg-transparent px-3 py-1 text-sm shadow-sm transition-colors file:border-0 file:bg-transparent file:text-sm file:font-medium placeholder:text-muted-foreground focus-visible:outline-none focus-visible:ring-1 focus-visible:ring-ring disabled:cursor-not-allowed disabled:opacity-50

custom_rules: Do NOT use the default 'Card' component for everything. Use raw divs with grid borders for data density.
Use 'Recharts' for analytics, but style them minimally (hide grid lines, use palette colors).

icons.style: Stroke width 1.5px for a refined look.

login.layout: Split screen. Left: 50% Image (Campus) with Deep Teal overlay. Right: 50% Form (Clean, minimal).
login.elements: Logo, Email/Password fields, 'Forgot Password' link, 'Sign In' button.

dashboard_student.layout: Bento Grid. Hero widget (Attendance), List widget (Notices), Chart widget (Marks).
dashboard_student.features: Quick Request buttons (OD, Leave) as prominent tiles.

dashboard_faculty.layout: High Density Grid. Table view for Attendance marking. Quick approval queue.

dashboard_admin.layout: Analytics Command Center. Key metrics row at top. Large charts below.
dashboard_admin.features: User management table with bulk actions.

universal_guidelines: Avoid 'AI Slop': No generic centered layouts. No gradients on text.
Micro-interactions: All buttons must have hover states (scale, color shift).
Data-TestID: All interactive elements MUST have data-testid attributes.
Accessibility: Ensure contrast ratios. Use semantic HTML.
Theme: Default to Light Mode (Warm Stone). Support Dark Mode (Deep Obsidian).
instructions_to_main_agent: You are building a Smart Digital Campus system. Follow the 'Swiss & Organic' aesthetic. Use the provided image URLs. Implement the Bento Grid layouts. Prioritize density and clarity for the dashboards. Use Shadcn components but override their styles to match the 'Deep Teal/Warm Stone' palette.
